name: Prince of Persia: Time Run
storyline: The Prince walks in a desert, and suddenly he is dragged into a magical tunnel where time loops.
summary: Prince of Persia: Time Run was an endless runner game on mobile, soft launched in Australia and New Zealand region on app store first. A few months later it was very briefly released worldwide before it disappeared. The game is no longer available.
